title-group.article-title: On the Irreducibility of Hecke Polynomials

abstract.p: Let <tex-math>$T_{n,k} (X)$</tex-math> be the characteristic polynomial of the nth Hecke operator acting on the space of cusp forms of weight k for the full modular group. We record a simple criterion which can be used to check the irreducibility of the polynomials <tex-math>$T_{n,k} (X)$</tex-math> Using this criterion with some machine computation, we show that if there exists n ≥ 2 such that <tex-math>$T_{n,k} (X)$</tex-math> is irreducible and has the full symmetric group as Galois group, then the same is true of <tex-math>$T_{p,k} (X).$</tex-math> for each prime p ≤ 4,000,000.
